column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/328433fbd5be0276da03a5199afc39ed5264c5e9 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

Thanks for taking the time to try out something here, but I'm going to have to decline this optimization.  The timing resistant equal is used to avoid leaking information about the length of RPC passwords in timing, your optimization would restore that information leak.\n\nIf you're interested in working on improving performance, I suggest doing some profiling on Bitcoin and working on things that
